title: x/mobile/gobind task failed: FileNotFoundException
body:
If project doesn't contain local.properties file, gobind always fails:

gobind FAILED

FAILURE: Build failed with an exception.

* What went wrong:
Execution failed for task ':project_name:gobind'.
> java.io.FileNotFoundException: 
> _some_path_/local.properties (No such file or directory)

Expected behavior:
ANDROID_HOME must be used as a path to Android SDK.
local.properties must be optional
